extendedInfo.description: Citybotâs San Francisco Smart Travel Guide creates custom itineraries for visitors both familiar with and new to SF. This free app provides a personalized experiences based on your interests, transportation needs and schedule, suggesting what to do in San Francisco, CA.Key Features-Tailored Itineraries:Simply tell Citybot what type of activities interest you and in a matter of seconds receive a personalized schedule with an interactive map. From a local favorite cafe in Nob Hill, followed by a trip to the Golden Gate Park, ending with dinner in a well priced 3 star restaurant in the Mission.Smart Planning:Never worry about trying to determine the best way to get from place to place or if your next stop is open. Citybot will suggest how to get to your destination and when you should arrive.Peer Recommendations:Citybot has asked both locals and visitors, and will only share activities that get the best ratings and recommendations. We have collected data from dozens of sites so you can know the best places in the Castro, the Pacific Heights, SoMa, and beyond.Citybot wants you to get the most out of your visit :)Have questions or comments? Send them to feedback@citybot.com and we will write back within 24 hours.

reviews.title: Made My Trip So Simple
reviews.comment: Brought me around to the best spots around SF without taking a bunch of time to plan. Guided me to some hidden gems that I would have otherwise missed. ESSENTIAL APP for SF.
reviews.author: Anthony Attard

reviews.title: A very clever and easy to use app
reviews.comment: Makes one\'s heart sing when a developer adds something to the \"Simple yet brilliant\" category.  This app is clean, quick, and feature-rich.  The fact that an early release is this intuitive and pleasant speaks a great deal about the team behind it - great work!!!
reviews.author: Alex May

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Easy to use, intuitive app.  Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Aleksey Solodovnik

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Love this app! What a brilliant idea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Light years ahead of other travel planning apps
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Its like there\'s a robot in this app that plots together a full day of things to do taking into account what kinds of things I like / want to do (i.e. museums, bars, parks, restaurants), activity ratings, where I am starting and ending my day, how close things are together and their open hours, etc. I ended up with a full itinerary of activities, personalize just for me. Easy to edit and share from there.    I\'m hopeful that the next version will let me reserve restaurants, buy tickets, etc.  And deals would be cool too.
reviews.author: Jon Belmonte

reviews.title: Excellent idea
reviews.comment: Combines data from yelp, frommers, trip advisor and others in one app. Seeing itinerary on a map and Instagram pics are very useful. Plz add support for more cities.
reviews.author: Alexander Tkach

reviews.title: needs to work offline
reviews.comment: Needs to work offline fully like the Tripadvisor app.... other than that, a great concept
reviews.author: Andre Parent

reviews.comment: Best travel app i ve seen in the long time
reviews.author: Ilya Evdokimov
